T02TD2047E:147b-1: rakta ya m'a ri aa ba li s'a dha nam tsinta ma ni n'a ma /
T02TD2047E:147b-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i las kyi phred ba'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02TD2047E:147b-4: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2047E:147b-5: lha dang lha min ma lus cod pan gyis btud pa'i //
T02TD2047E:147b-6: zhabs kyi padma dang ldan 'jam dbyangs rdo rje dang //
T02TD2047E:147b-7: de nyid rang bzhin khro bo gshin rje gshed po la //
T02TD2047E:147b-8: btud nas de yi sgrub thabs gsal bar bri //
T02TD2047E:147b-10: dam pa'i shes gnyen rnyed dka' bas //
T02TD2047E:147b-11: 'dod pa ma lus bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2047E:147b-12: sngags pas 'bad pas mkhas pas kye //
T02TD2047E:147b-13: re zhig 'gro ba ma lus par gdon par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2047E:147b-14: dad pa mchog dang ldan pa /
T02TD2047E:147b-16: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa so sor rtogs par dang ldan pa cig gi gshin rje gshed dmar po'i bzlas pa bya ba sngon du 'gro bas sam /
T02TD2047E:147b-17: lha'i rjes su gnang ba thob pas gnod spyin mo la sogs pa'i dngos grub bam /
T02TD2047E:147b-18: sems la 'dod pa gang yin pa bsam gtan la gnas pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2047E:147b-19: de skad du yang gsungs pa ni //
T02TD2047E:147b-20: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD2047E:147b-23: rnam pa gzhan gyis mi 'grub bo //
T02TD2047E:148a-1: nags tshal dben pa dag tu ni //
T02TD2047E:148a-2: yang na sangs 'di tha mas cad kyis //
T02TD2047E:148a-3: sngags pa rnams kyis bye ba bzlas //
T02TD2047E:148a-4: las ni thams cad byed par gsungs //
T02TD2047E:148a-5: gang zhig phun sum tshogs pa yin //
T02TD2047E:148a-6: bya ba thams cad 'dod pa des //
T02TD2047E:148a-7: nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag / zla ba lta bur sems tsam nyid //
T02TD2047E:148a-8: bdag kyang de yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2047E:148a-9: snod dang bcud kyi 'gro ba dang //
T02TD2047E:148a-10: sems tsam nyid du sems can kun //
T02TD2047E:148a-11: yang dag sangs rgyas de sras rnams //
T02TD2047E:148a-12: bdag gi sems su gnyis med bya //
T02TD2047E:148a-13: de yi 'od zer lcags kyu yis //
T02TD2047E:148a-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan ni //
T02TD2047E:148a-15: sa dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02TD2047E:148a-16: nam mkha' lta bur bsgom par bya //
T02TD2047E:148a-17: dkar po'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD2047E:148a-19: rang sems de ltar bsgoms pa las //
T02TD2047E:148a-20: sngon gyi som lam stobs kyis ni //
T02TD2047E:148a-21: snying rjes bskul nas 'di lta ste //
T02TD2047E:148a-22: sa 'og bar du bsgom par bya //
T02TD2047E:148a-23: ae ma sems can sdug bsngal can //
T02TD2047E:148a-24: 'khor bar yun du gnas pa dang /
T02TD2047E:148a-25: thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis //
T02TD2047E:148a-26: yang dang yang du yun ring gnas //
T02TD2047E:148a-27: de rnams kun gyis rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD2047E:148a-28: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por bsgom //
T02TD2047E:148a-29: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02TD2047E:148a-31: de las byung ba'i 'od zer ldan //
T02TD2047E:148a-32: ka la sogs pa'i yi ges brgyan //
T02TD2047E:148a-33: rim gyis skyes pa'i sems nyid ni //
T02TD2047E:148a-34: sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed //
T02TD2047E:148a-35: kun kyang snying rje'i stobs las byung /
T02TD2047E:148a-37: // / gnod spyin mo la sogs pa'i sgrub ba gang la yang khrus kyi cho ga bstan pa /
T02TD2047E:148a-38: de la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02TD2047E:148a-40: thog ma nas ma skyes pa /
T02TD2047E:148a-41: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa /
T02TD2047E:148a-42: thog ma nas zhi ba'i chos thams cad la sogs pa lhag mar mos pas bdag gi lus dang phyi dang nang thams cad rdul phra rab kyi rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i mi dmigs pa'i spyod pas myur du grub par byed pas /
T02TD2047E:148a-43: nang gi khrus chen po la nan tan du bya'o //
T02TD2047E:148b-0: gang zhig phyi'i rjas la chags pa rmongs pa'i blo can rnam par rtog pa'i dpyod pas the tshom sel bar mi nus pa des phyi'i khrus kyi @148b cho ga 'di bya'o //
T02TD2047E:148b-1: thog mar re zhig h'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD2047E:148b-2: khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD2047E:148b-3: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa khro gnyer dang bcas pa /
T02TD2047E:148b-4: sku mdog sngon po 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer 'khrug pa /
T02TD2047E:148b-5: dang po'i rdo rje 'gying pa nga rgyal dang bcas pa rdo rje chen po 'od zer 'bar ba'i me stag 'phro ba /
T02TD2047E:148b-6: dang bor rdo rje gsor zhing bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba ltar 'bar ba /
T02TD2047E:148b-7: rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar bar bdag nyid sprul nas /
T02TD2047E:148b-8: aom h'um pi dhu pi k'a ya dhu pi pra dzva li ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:148b-10: rdo rje bsngams pas nang du bstan te /
T02TD2047E:148b-11: bar dang bcas pa mthe bo rdo rje rtse sprad nas phyir gyed pas rdo rje me'i dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas bdag nyid 'bar bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:148b-12: rdo rje 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas bzod par dka' ba'o //
T02TD2047E:148b-13: de'i rjes su bskyed rim che bar bstan pa bzhin du rdo rje go cha ste /
T02TD2047E:148b-14: de'i rjes su aom bhur dzva la aom h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:148b-16: cha gsum du byas la sangs 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas khrus byed pa'i sar bzhag ste /
T02TD2047E:148b-17: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings la chu'am chu'i snod gnas la bgegs thams cad bskrad pa'i ched du 'og dang steng bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:148b-18: aom bhu dzva li sva h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:148b-20: gong du bshad pa'i sa cha gsum po las cha gcig gis bshang lam bkrus te /
T02TD2047E:148b-21: lag pa gnyis bkrus la nye rag bya'o //
T02TD2047E:148b-22: cha gnyis la h'um zhes brjod cing lus po thams cad khrus byas te cha gsum pas mgo bkrus nas /
T02TD2047E:148b-23: aom bum dzva la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:148b-24: zhes pa 'dis nye bar reg nas rang gi mgo la sngags dang bcas pa'i chu gtor nas //
T02TD2047E:148b-25: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag byin gyis brlabs nas khrus byed sa nas ldang bar byed do //
T02TD2047E:148b-26: de'i rjes la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sangs bzlas pa'i chus gos la gtor nas /
T02TD2047E:148b-27: ji lta ba bzhin gyon nas yi ge brgya pa brjod cing /
T02TD2047E:148b-28: yid kyis chu'i gnas kyi srung ma gshegs nas /
T02TD2047E:148b-29: skad cig gis lha'i nga rgyal gyis de'i sngags yid kyis brjod cing bsam gtan gyi khang pa'i drung du 'gro bar bya //
T02TD2047E:148b-30: de nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus la rig ma des nye bar reg la /
T02TD2047E:149a-1: ces pa lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bgegs tham cad bskrad nas /
T02TD2047E:149a-2: bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02TD2047E:149a-3: yang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis stan la sogs pa dang bsam gtan gyi khang pa la byung pa la sogs pa gtor nas nye bar reg par bya'o //
T02TD2047E:149a-4: sam ya stva zhes brjod cing phyag g-yas bkan par byas la /
T02TD2047E:149a-5: gung mo dang srin lag tsam bkug nas /
T02TD2047E:149a-6: phyag rgya 'dis rkang pa gnyis kyi nang du bcug la /
T02TD2047E:149a-7: cog bur bsdad de smra ba bcad la /
T02TD2047E:149a-8: padma'i tshul gyis kha la yang yang reg par byas /
T02TD2047E:149a-9: lan gnyis sam lan gsum du rna ba gnyis dang mig gnyis dang sna dang kha dang lag pa gnyis dang /
T02TD2047E:149a-10: lte ba dang mgo la reg par bya ba ni mgo bkur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2047E:149a-11: de ltar khrus byas pa 'am ma byas kyang rung /
T02TD2047E:149a-12: ri'i sul la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su chags pa thams cad dang bral bas spyod lam yangs par ngag bcad la /
T02TD2047E:149a-13: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis gnod spyin mo'i sgrub par nye bar bya ste /
T02TD2047E:149a-14: de la h'm gi ges 'gro ba thams cad stong par byas la /
T02TD2047E:149a-15: bi ma lo dhe dhi dh'um zhes pa brjod pas /
T02TD2047E:149a-16: rgya mtsho chen po'i steng du aom aa pa tsa la bi re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:149a-17: zhes pas gser gyi rang bzhin gyi steng aom aa pa tsa la h'um zhes pas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi ri'i rgyal po tshad med pa /
T02TD2047E:149a-18: me tog dang shing thog sna tshogs pa dang nags tshal gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2047E:149a-19: dpag bsam gyi shing gis brgyan pa /
T02TD2047E:149a-20: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod dang ldan pa yid du 'ong bar bsgoms te /
T02TD2047E:149a-21: der hr'i:'i yi ge las padma /
T02TD2047E:149a-22: de'i steng du a'a li dang po aa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2047E:149a-23: de'i steng du kshim rnam par bsam mo //
T02TD2047E:149a-24: de'i sgra dang 'od zer gyi sprin gyi tshogs kyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab par bsam /
T02TD2047E:149a-25: 'od zer de dag gnod spyin mo'i gzugs su gyur te tshur 'dus nas kshim de nyid la thim par gyur /
T02TD2047E:149a-26: kshim de nyid yongs su gyur pa las gnod spyin mo longs spyod can ma zhes bya ba lang tsho rgyas pa sgeg pa'i ro dang ldan pa /
T02TD2047E:149a-27: mdzes ma lha mo'i gzugs lta bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD2047E:149a-28: sku mdog ljang gu gos dkar pos smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02TD2047E:149b-0: phyag g-yon @149b ba dpag bsam gyi shing la 'jug pa /
T02TD2047E:149b-1: phyag g-yas pa me tog kha dog lnga dang ldan pas brgyan pa /
T02TD2047E:149b-2: steng na gdugs dkar po rang bzhin gyis gnas pa /
T02TD2047E:149b-3: 'gying ba'i tshul gyis 'gying zhing g-yo ba med pa de ltar rnam par bsam mo //
T02TD2047E:149b-4: de nas gong du bstan pa'i sangs dang phyag rgya des byin gyis brlabs te kha lta bu'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2047E:149b-5: aom ya m'anta ka h'um zhes pas rang gi thugs ka nas gshin rje'i gshed gong du bstan pa'i gzugs can rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
T02TD2047E:149b-6: sku las 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba /
T02TD2047E:149b-7: nyi ma byed ba lta bu dang ldan pa /
T02TD2047E:149b-8: bgegs ma lus pa 'jigs par byed pa /
T02TD2047E:149b-9: 'jig rten gsum po bsdigs par byed pa'i khro bo cig spros la /
T02TD2047E:149b-10: de la bka' bsgo ba byas pas gnod spyin mo bkug nas /
T02TD2047E:149b-11: bdag gi sku la zhugs nas slar phyir spros te gnod spyin mo'i mgo bdag gi zhabs kyis mnan nas gnas par bsgom mo //
T02TD2047E:149b-12: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa dang mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2047E:149b-13: gong bzhin du gdan dang mchod yon dbul ba dang /
T02TD2047E:149b-14: mtheb mdzub gnyis skam pa ltar byas la sor mo gzhan rnams phyir bskyed de zhabs bsil gyi sngags kyis zhabs bsil phul la dam tshig ma'i phyag rgya bstan te /
T02TD2047E:149b-15: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya gong du bstan to //
T02TD2047E:149b-16: 'dir dam tshig ma la ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te srin lag gnyis phyir bskyed la tshigs gsum pa bkug ste phye ba 'di ni gnod spyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2047E:149b-17: aom bha ga wa ti dri shya ho //
T02TD2047E:149b-18: de bzhin du lha mo rang rang gi rtog pa nas byung ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sngags gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:149b-19: de nas aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes dbang bskur bar bya ste phyag rgya gong du bstan zin to //
T02TD2047E:149b-20: de nas mchod yon lngas mchod do //
T02TD2047E:149b-21: aom gyi yi ge las byung ba'i me tog dang /
T02TD2047E:149b-28: rag dung la sogs pa'i sgra'i bye brag dang /
T02TD2047E:150a-13: ji lta ba bzhin du gnas la yod pa dang /
T02TD2047E:150a-14: gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pas nam mkha' khyab par khengs pas mchog spyin mo la mchod pa byas par bsam /
T02TD2047E:150a-15: de nas gong bzhin du dril bu dkrol zhing byin rlabs kyi phyag rgyas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2047E:150a-16: gong bzhin du gnod spyin mo'i rin po che'i ri la gnas la /
T02TD2047E:150a-17: sgrub pa'i dbang du gyur pa /
T02TD2047E:150a-18: rang gi gzugs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' gang par byed pa de nyid thun gsum mam bzhir bsgoms pas nges par 'grub po //
T02TD2047E:150a-19: gang zhig bsgom pas 'grub par mi nus pa des rtog pa las bshad pa'i sangs bzhin du bzlas par bya ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2047E:150a-20: aom bha ga wa te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:150a-23: mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga byas la //
T02TD2047E:150a-24: gnod spyin mo'i sngags rang gi snying las bskyed /
T02TD2047E:150a-25: rang gi sngags gnod spyin mo'i snying la thun gsum mam bzhi'i rim pas bzlas pa bya /
T02TD2047E:150a-26: ngal na yang dag par mchod de yi ge brgya ba brjod la ;
T02TD2047E:150a-28: zhes pa phyag rgyal sogs dgrol ba'i bsam pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya kha steng du bstan pas dgrol lo //
T02TD2047E:150a-29: de kho na ltar nyi ma re res yi ge'i grangs kyi 'bum yongs su rdzogs par byas la 'phags pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis gos sar pa mis ma gyon pa 'am shing leb bam gang yang rung ba skye bos dben pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su /
T02TD2047E:150a-30: bla re dgram pa dang gdugs la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2047E:150a-31: me tog dri zhim po dang bdug spos dang mar me la gos pas nye bar brgyan pa dang sa bzhi la dri'i byug pa byas pa'i steng du bzhag ste /
T02TD2047E:150a-32: gnod spyin mo gong du bstan pa'i gzugs su sprul nas /
T02TD2047E:150a-33: dgug ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya sngon du bsams te /
T02TD2047E:150b-0: rjes la ji ltar bde bas rang gis bri ba'i ri mo mkhan la gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyi srung ba @150b byas la //
T02TD2047E:150b-1: de lta bu'i thang ka la skye bos dben pa 'am /
T02TD2047E:150b-2: tshal du rab gnas byas la ;
T02TD2047E:150b-3: nya la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mar me bzhi phul nas gong du bstan pa'i tshogs thams cad la byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa chen po byas te //
T02TD2047E:150b-4: dung la sogs pa'i mchod yon gyi snod la me tog dkar po dri zhim po'i chu la bsres pas gang bar byas la lag pas snod la reg la dgongs mo nas brtsams smyung gnas byas la de srid bar du bzlas pa byas /
T02TD2047E:150b-5: ji srid bar du logs spyod spyin byed ma lha mo'i gzugs lta bu longs spyod can ma 'ongs nas bdag nyid kyi lag pa gnyis nas 'dzin te byung na mig mi blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:150b-6: gal te bltas na sgrub pa po nyid rengs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:150b-7: mtshams bcad pa ni dra ba dang /
T02TD2047E:150b-10: khyed bde bar spyon la sogs par byas la /
T02TD2047E:150b-11: bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon phul la snyim pa sbyar la mthe bod gnyis rtser bzhag la mchod yon dbul ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas /
T02TD2047E:150b-12: aom sarba de ba t'a tsintya mri ta dh'a ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:150b-14: de nas mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2047E:150b-15: dri dang me tog dang spos la sogs pa yang mchod yon phul nas snyim pa kha phye la chu gnyis bsnol mar byas la /
T02TD2047E:150b-16: de'i nang mthe bong gnyis bcug la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bong mnan par byas te /
T02TD2047E:150b-17: srin lag gnyis rtse sprad nas gung mo gnyis phyir bskyed par bya ba ni zhi ba'i gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2047E:150b-18: aom hi hi tu ru tu ru sam pu ra ya ma h'a pa ya na h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:150b-19: aa mri ta dh'a ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:150b-22: khyed kyi bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na /
T02TD2047E:150b-23: de'i tshe gong du gang 'dod pa de nyid blang par bya'i gzhan ni mi smra'o //
T02TD2047E:150b-25: zhes pa'i sangs 'di snying po phyag rgya dang bcas pas mchog blangs pa de lta'i bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:150b-26: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong phyir bskyed la bstan pa snying gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2047E:150b-27: 'og tu kha blta na mchog blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:150b-28: de ni sgrub pa pos aa ma nyid du blangs na bu lta bur skyong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:150b-29: grub thob dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-0: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang lhan cig @151a * //
T02TD2047E:151a-2: shing thog kyang ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-3: sgrub pa po gang gis zos pa de tshe bskal pa tsam du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-4: srin mo gyis shig ces brjod na 'dis nor bcu gnyis ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-5: sgrub pa po 'khor bcu gcig dang bcas pa la kha zas bsgrim pa med par ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-7: pho nya mo byas na dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas kyang skyes pa'am bud med gang 'dod pa khugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-8: gong du bstan pa'i aa ma'i don yang byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-9: yang na khyim thab mar gyur pas ri rab la sogs pa la nye bar gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can gyi gnas ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-10: rig 'dzin grub pa rnams kyi tshe bskal pa'i bar du thub par bya ba'i ro bro ba'i shing thog rnams ster zhing zhes pa la sogs pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD2047E:151a-11: gang zhig gnod spyin mo rtog pa las bshad pa'i dus la 'gal nas 'ong bar ma gyur na /
T02TD2047E:151a-12: de'i tshe rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas gnod spyin mo de dus la ma bab bar du bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:151a-13: aom badzra spho ta h'um bam zhes pa'i phyag rgya gong du bstan zin to //
T02TD2047E:151a-14: gal te ci yang mi smra na //
T02TD2047E:151a-15: de'i tshe rdo rje bzhad ma'i phyag rgyas smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2047E:151a-16: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2047E:151a-17: na mo badzra p'a nis pa la ha se ha sa badzra ni ku ru ku ru /
T02TD2047E:151a-18: kam pa kam pa tsa la tsa la kalpa kalpa sv'a h'a /
T02TD2047E:151a-20: dngos gra ma byin par 'gro bar 'gyur na de nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:151a-21: phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar nas srin lag gnyis nang du bsnol te mthe bong gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtsa ba mnan par byas /
T02TD2047E:151a-22: gung mo gnyis rtse sprad nas de'i rtsa ru mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par rtse sprad de gzhag / mthe chung gnyis bsnol te phyir bskyed par bya zhes so //
T02TD2047E:151a-23: 'byung po thams cad la chu la bzlas la brjod par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2047E:151a-24: gnod spyin mo dag / aa pa r'a dzi ta dang /
T02TD2047E:151a-25: gzhan yang yi dvags mo la sogs pa'i cho ga 'di ni ji ltar sbyor ba ji lta bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2047E:151a-26: longs spyod can ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//
